mail.subject: Your Cairn.info account has been created.
mail.body:
Hello,
Thank you for signing up on Cairn International! Your personal account has been created with the following information:
Email address: [EMAIL] First name: [PRENOM] Last name: [NOM] Activity : [ACTIVITY] Subject of interest: [DISCIPLINE]
Your password is the one you entered during the sign in process.
For any other question, do not hesitate to: - see our online help page on http://www.cairn-int.info/help.php ; - follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/cairnint ; - or contact us using http://www.cairn-int.info/contact.php.
Yours,
Cairn.info International Edition
---------------------- Cairn S.A. 58/60, rue des Champs B-4020 LiÃ¨ge BELGIUM Terms of use: http://www.cairn-int.info/conditions.php
